sense.gloss: stagnation, tie-up, standstill, congestion, delay, accumulation, falling into arrears
falling behind (with a payment), being in arrears, non-payment, default, delinquency
arrears, (being) overdue, delay (e.g. in payment), procrastination
to stagnate, to be delayed, to be left undone
to be overdue (of a payment), to fall into arrears, to be outstanding

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓はベルリンに↑長期↑↓ちょうき↓に↑滞在↑↓たいざい↓するつもりですか。
sdata.e: Are you planning on staying long in Berlin?

sdata.j: あなたはここにどれくらい↑滞在↑↓たいざい↓するのですか。

sdata.j: ↑京都↑↓きょうと↓の↑繁華↑↓はんか↓↑街↑↓がい↓は↑交通↑↓こうつう↓↑渋滞↑↓じゅうたい↓がすごかった。
sdata.e: There was an enormous traffic jam in downtown Kyoto.

sdata.j: ↑京都↑↓きょうと↓に↑滞在↑↓たいざい↓↑中↑↓ちゅう↓、↑彼↑↓かれ↓は↑案内↑↓あんない↓↑役↑↓やく↓をしてくれた。
sdata.e: He acted as a guide while I was staying in Kyoto.
